class Rectangle(Shape)
Make a class named Rectangle that is-a Shape.

class Employee: def __init__(self, id, supervisor)
class Employee has-a __init__ that takes self, id, and supervisor parameters.

class Vehicle: def drive(self, distance)
class Vehicle has-a function named drive that takes self and distance parameters.

email_validator = EmailValidator()
Set email_validator to an instance of class EmailValidator.

publisher.get_context_data(**kwargs)
From publisher, get the get_context_data method, and call it with parameters **kwargs.

album.release_date = '2003-04-02'
From album, get the release_date attribute, and set it to '2003-04-02'.
